title: #23: Discussing the Orlando Mass Shooting
description:
Jim Clemente, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti analyze the lead up, aftermath and causes of the night club hate crime mass shooting in Orlando.

Thank you Blue Apron for sponsoring our show. For a special offer for our listeners, go to www.blueapron.com/realcrime
